original_text:
Indeed, of Zion it will be said,
    “This one and that one were born in her,
    and the Most High himself will establish her.”
korean_text: 시온에 대하여 말하기를 이 사람, 저 사람이 거기서 났다고 말하리니 지존자가 친히 시온을 세우리라 하는도다

sentences.original_text: of Zion it will be said,
This one and that one were born in her,
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람과 저 사람이 그곳에서 태어났고,

sentences.original_text: and the Most High himself will establish her.
